name: get_embed_preset_videos
description: Get all the videos that have been added to an embed preset

page.description: The page number of the results to show.

per_page.description: The number of items to show on each page of results, up to a maximum of 100.

$ul: **categories**: The categories to which this video belongs.
**content_rating**: The content ratings of this video.
**context**: The context of the video's subscription, if this video is part of a subscription.
**action**: The contextual action:
**resource**: The contextual resource: a user, group, or channel representation, or an object of a tag.
**resource_type**: The contextual resource type.
**created_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the video was created.
**description**: A brief explanation of the video's content.
**duration**: The video's duration in seconds.
**embed**
**buttons**: A collection of information about the buttons that appear on the interface of the embeddable player.
**embed**: Whether the Embed button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**fullscreen**: Whether the Fullscreen button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**hd**: Whether the HD button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**like**: Whether the Like button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**scaling**: Whether the Scaling button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**share**: Whether the Share button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**watchlater**: Whether the Watch Later button appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**color**: The primary player color, which controls the color of the progress bar, buttons, and more.
**logos**: A collection of information about the logo in the corner of the embeddable player.
**custom**: A collection of information relating to custom logos in the embeddable player.
**active**: Whether the custom logo appears in the embeddable player.
**link**: The URL that loads upon clicking the custom logo.
**sticky**: Whether the custom logo appears even when the player interface is hidden.
**vimeo**: Whether the Vimeo logo appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**playbar**: Whether the playbar appears in the embeddable player for this video.
**speed**: Whether the speed controls appear in the embeddable player for this video.
**title**: A collection of information relating to the embeddable player's title bar.
**name**: How the embeddable player handles the video title:
**owner**: How the embeddable player handles the video owner's information:
**portrait**: How the embeddable player handles the video owner's portrait:
**uri**: The URI of the embed preset.
**volume**: Whether the volume controls appear in the embeddable player for this video.
**height**: The video's height in pixels.
**language**: The video's primary language.
**last_user_action_event_date**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the user last modified the video.
**license**: The [Creative Commons](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/) license used for the video:
**link**: The link to the video.
**metadata**: The video's metadata.
**connections**: A list of resource URIs related to the video.
**comments**: Information about the comments on this video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of comments on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**credits**: Information about the users credited in this video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of users on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**likes**: Information about the users who have liked this video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of likes on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**ondemand**: Information about this video's ondemand data.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**resource_key**: The On Demand connection resource key.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**pictures**: Information about this video's thumbnails.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods allowed on this URI.
**total**: Total number of thumbnails on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**playback**: The DRM playback status connection for this video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**recommendations**: The recommendations for this video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods allowed on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**related**: Related content for this video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods allowed on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**season**: Information about the video's season.
**name**: The name of this season.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**texttracks**: Information about this video's text tracks.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of text tracks on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**trailer**: Information about this video's VOD trailer.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**resource_key**: The trailer connection resource key.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**users_with_access**: Information about the user privacy of this video, if the video privacy is `users`.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of users on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**versions**: Information about the versions of this video.
**current_uri**: The URI of the current version of the video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of versions on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**interactions**: A list of resource URIs related to the video.
**buy**: The Buy interaction for a On Demand video.
**currency**: The currency code for the current user's region.
**display_price**: Formatted price to display to buy an On Demand video.
**download**: The user's download access to this On Demand video:
**drm**: Whether the video has DRM.
**link**: The URL to buy the On Demand video on Vimeo.
**price**: The numeric value of the price for buying the On Demand video.
**purchase_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the On Demand video was purchased.
**stream**: The user's streaming access to this On Demand video:
**uri**: The product URI to purchase the On Demand video.
**channel**: When a video is referenced by a channel URI, if the user is a moderator of the channel, include information about removing the video from the channel.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**like**: Information about whether the authenticated user has liked this video.
**added**: Whether the user has liked the video.
**added_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the user liked the video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**rent**: The Rent interaction for an On Demand video.
**currency**: The currency code for the current user's region.
**display_price**: Formatted price to display to rent an On Demand video.
**drm**: Whether the video has DRM.
**expires_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the rental period for the video expires.
**link**: The URL to rent the On Demand video on Vimeo.
**price**: The numeric value of the price for buying the On Demand video.
**purchase_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the On Demand video was rented.
**stream**: The user's streaming access to this On Demand video:
**uri**: The product URI to rent the On Demand video.
**report**: Information about where and how to report a video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**reason**: A list of valid reasons for reporting a video.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**subscribe**: Subscription information for an On Demand video.
**drm**: Whether the video has DRM.
**expires_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the subscription expires.
**purchase_time**: The tine in ISO 8601 format when the subscription was purchased.
**stream**: The stream type.
**watched**: Information about removing this video from the user's list of watched videos.
**added**: Whether the user has watched the video.
**added_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the user watched the video.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**watchlater**: Information about whether this video appears on the authenticated user's Watch Later list.
**added**: Whether the user has added the video to their Watch later list.
**added_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the user added the video to their Watch Later list.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**modified_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the video metadata was last modified.
**name**: The video's title.
**parent_folder**
**created_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the project was created.
**metadata**: The project's metadata.
**connections**: A list of resource URIs related to the project.
**videos**: A standard connection object indicating how to get all the videos in this project.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of videos on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**modified_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the project was last modified.
**name**: The name of the folder.
**resource_key**: The resource key string of the project.
**uri**: The URI of the project.
**user**
**account**: The user's account type:
**bio**: The user's bio.
**content_filter**: The user's content filters:
**created_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the user account was created.
**email**: The user's email address. This data requires a bearer token with the `email` scope.
**link**: The absolute URL of this user's profile page.
**location**: The user's location.

**active**: Whether this picture is the active picture for its parent resource.

**preferences**
**videos**
**privacy**
**add**: Whether other users can add the user's videos.
**comments**: The user's privacy preference for comments:
**download**: Whether other users can download the user's videos.
**embed**: The user's privacy preference for embeds:
**view**: The user's privacy preference for views:
**resource_key**: The user's resource key string.
**upload_quota**: Appears only when the user has upload access and is looking at their own user record.
**lifetime**: Information about the user's lifetime upload usage.
**free**: The number of bytes remaining in your lifetime maximum.
**max**: The total number of bytes that you can upload across the lifetime of your account.
**used**: The number of bytes that you've already uploaded against your lifetime limit.
**periodic**: Information about the user's usage for the current period.
**free**: The number of bytes remaining in your upload quota for the current period.
**max**: The total number of bytes that you can upload per period.
**reset_date**: The time in ISO 8601 format when your upload quota resets.
**used**: The number of bytes that you've already uploaded against your quota in the current period.
**space**: Information about the user's upload space remaining for the current period.
**free**: The number of bytes remaining in your upload quota.
**max**: The maximum number of bytes allotted to your upload quota.
**showing**: Whether the values of the upload_quota.space fields are for the lifetime quota or the periodic quota.
**used**: The number of bytes that you've already uploaded against your quota.
**uri**: The user's canonical relative URI.
**websites**: The user's websites.
**password**: The privacy-enabled password to watch this video. Only users can see their own video passwords. This data requires a bearer token with the `private` scope.

**spatial**: 360 spatial data.
**director_timeline**: 360 director timeline.
**field_of_view**: The 360 field of view, from 30 (minimum) to 90 (maximum). The default is 50.
**projection**: The 360 spatial projection:
**stereo_format**: The 360 stereo format:
**stats**: A collection of stats associated with this video.
**plays**: The current total number of times that the video has been played.
**status**: The status code for the availability of the video. This field is deprecated in favor of `upload` and `transcode`.
**tags**: An array of all tags assigned to this video.
**transcode**: The transcode information for a video upload.
**status**: Status code for this video's availability.
**upload**: The upload information for this video.
**approach**: The approach for uploading the video.
**complete_uri**: The URI for completing the upload.
**form**: The HTML form for uploading a video through the post approach.
**link**: The link of the video to capture through the pull approach.
**redirect_url**: The redirect URL for the upload app.
**size**: The file size in bytes of the uploaded video.
**status**: The status code for the availability of the uploaded video:
**upload_link**: The link for sending video file data.
**uri**: The video's canonical relative URI.
